full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I SGRUB THABS 'DOD PA'I RE BA BSKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
